markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 9" pfs="Standard">
[Telepathic Demand](/Spells.aspx?ID=2036)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Incapacitation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=631" />
<trait label="Linguistic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=642" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 253 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** planetary

**Target** 1 creature you’ve telepathically contacted before
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

**Duration** varies
</row>

</column>

---

You send the target a message of 25 words or fewer, and it can respond immediately with its own message of 25 words or fewer. Your message is insidious and has the effect of a [_suggestion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1693) spell, with the message substituting for the spoken suggestion. On a successful save, the target is temporarily immune for 1 day, and on a critical success, the target is temporarily immune for 1 month. You can target a creature only if you've previously been in telepathic contact with it before, such as via the [_telepathy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1719) spell.
name: Telepathic Demand

**Target** 1 creature you’ve telepathically contacted before
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

**Duration** varies
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Impel a creature with a mental message.
</summary>
summary: Impel a creature with a mental message.
summary_markdown: Impel a creature with a mental message.
text: Telepathic Demand Three Actions Source Player Core 2 pg. 253 1.1 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult Range planetary Target 1 creature you’ve telepathically contacted before Defense Will Duration varies --- You send the target a message of 25 words or fewer, and it can respond immediately with its own message of 25 words or fewer. Your message is insidious and has the effect of a suggestion spell, with the message substituting for the spoken suggestion. On a successful save, the target is temporarily immune for 1 day, and on a critical success, the target is temporarily immune for 1 month. You can target a creature only if you've previously been in telepathic contact with it before, such as via the telepathy spell.
